text: Good morning. I'm testing this new versione of sessions.prg but there is a problem. If I launch the same login.prg in 2 different tabs of the browser, the cookie is always the same because the string that identifies it is not different.

elements.text: Good morning. I'm testing this new versione of sessions.prg but there is a problem. If I launch the same login.prg in 2 different tabs of the browser, the cookie is always the same because the string that identifies it is not different.

text: That's how cookies work. Try it with any other website you can log into, and it'll work the same.

elements.text: That's how cookies work. Try it with any other website you can log into, and it'll work the same.

text: Cookies are domain-specific, not tab-specific.

elements.text: Cookies are domain-specific, not tab-specific.
